name: La Posada de Taos B&B

reviews.title: Home away from home
reviews.text: Just spent 5 comfortable nights in the Beutler room. We felt the enchantment of Taos the minute we arrived with a personal welcome note awaiting us. The room was large and spacious, with a kiva fireplace complete with logs and kindling for us to light. We went to sleep to a crackling fire every night and looked forward to a hot breakfast each morning. Meeting new guests each morning was a special bonus, as everyone sits down for breakfast at the same time to share a little of themselves. La Posada is a special B&B that shouldn't be missed.

reviews.title: Nice Getaway
reviews.text: Nice little inn by the Plaza. We stayed in the La Casa cottage and had a grand time. It was newly remodeled with a skylight and hot tub. The innkeepers are very friendly and professional. They have a good website, too.

description: Taos' First B&B is centrally located just 2 blocks west of Taos Plaza, an easy walk to dozens of restaurants, galleries, shops and live music venues. Our full multi-course breakfast is served each morning to all our guests with no additional charge.
